title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: get up and running with Llama 3, Mistral, Gemma and other large language models locally.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python SDK for Ollama; chat, embed, pull and manage models with a few lines of code.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Node and browsers; chat, stream, create, delete models.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration to use any Ollama model as an LLM or embeddings provider.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Feature-rich web UI for Ollama (chat, model manager, RAG, multi-user).

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client for Ollama; supports chat, streaming, model ops and embeddings.

title: ollama-rb
summary: Community-maintained Ruby gem for interacting with the Ollama API.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Rust-based interactive CLI that wraps Ollama with prompt history and syntax highlighting.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension that brings local Ollama models inline as GitHub-Copilot-style suggestions.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Helm chart to deploy Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU node selection and horizontal scaling.

title: ollama-gui
summary: Lightweight Tauri desktop app for chatting with Ollama models (macOS/Win/Linux).

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration letting you use Ollama models as generators or embedders in RAG pipelines.

title: ollama-n8n-node
summary: Official n8n node to call Ollama models inside no-code workflows.

title: ollama-dagger-module
summary: Dagger module that spins up Ollama as a service for CI pipelines (test prompts, benchmarks).

title: ollama-csharp
summary: Community C#/.NET SDK for Ollama with async streaming and dependency-injection helpers.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Minimal Python template repo showing RAG with Ollama embeddings + Chroma vector store.

title: ollama-discord-bot
summary: Self-hosted Discord bot that lets servers chat with local Ollama models and switch personas.

title: ollama-elixir
summary: Elixir library wrapping Ollama API for Phoenix LiveView chat apps.

title: ollama-obsidian
summary: Obsidian plugin to run local LLM prompts on selected notes and insert generated text.

title: ollama-spring-boot-starter
summary: Spring Boot starter auto-configuring an Ollama REST client and chat service beans.
